item.title: 如果俄罗斯获胜，这并不意味着欧洲将出现新的铁幕。我们可以选择让乌克兰获胜。
item.description:
If Russia wins, that wouldn’t mean a new Iron Curtain descending across Europe. It would be more like a portable cotton curtain, blown around by Vladimir Putin’s will.

We could choose to let Ukraine win.https://t.co/4wHutmKgEO pic.twitter.com/RJxqXHiPes

— Financial Times (@FT) March 14, 2024

item.title: 当我们找到它的时候，那真是太好了。但是，拉弗曲线的右侧却令人难以捉摸 寻找拉弗曲线的推动力是徒劳的
